name: Hospital Floor Tile
description: Worn and aged hospital floor tile with visible grout lines, subtle dirt and stains, and slight reflective surface. Light cream/off-white color with gray grout. Suitable for medical/hospital environments in top-down games.

generated.prompt: A seamless tileable 64x64 pixel art hospital floor tile texture. Worn and aged linoleum appearance with visible grout lines between tiles. Light cream or off-white tile color with gray grout lines. Subtle dirt marks, scuff marks, and stains showing realistic wear and aging. Slight reflective surface suggesting polished floor with minimal shine. Top-down orthographic view. Clean retro pixel art style suitable for a top-down 2D game. The tile should be perfectly tileable on all edges to create a seamless floor pattern.
